website_summaries.verdict: Versatile treats that temp cats and may help improve their oral health in the process. The large canister makes these treats a good deal too.
pros: Crunchy treats with flavors cats can't resist
Texture is great for removing tarter and stimulating gums
cons: Can be fattening if you give your cat too many

customer_reviews.title: Real thing or import copy?
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our cats. Shortly after starting to give them out, about a week, my oldest one started licking himself so much that he created a bald spot. I suspected these so I stopped giving them to our friends and the licking stopped. I can't prove if they did it or not. I bought more from the pet store and no problems. I did notice that the ones I bought in the pet store did not leave a residue on the inside of the container but these left what looked to be a oily film. Take this for what it is worth, just be advised watch for problems.
customer_reviews.author: Price searcher

customer_reviews.title: "Cat Snack" time for Tweak, Butters, Towelcat, Sophie & Smudge
customer_reviews.text: Every night my 5 cats (all rescues) line up, one on each step on my staircase and each waits his/her turn for me to place a piece of party mix in front of them. If I am not there by 7:30 PM, they will hunt me down and cry until I give out "cats snacks," just have to shake the container & yell "cat snacks" and they all come flying -- adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Cat's absolutely love these treats.
customer_reviews.text: I concur with the majority view of this product. I have four cats, am the food provider for an additional four semi-feral cats and without exception they all love these treats, in all the flavors offered. The only downside, if it is a downside, is that they will no longer accept the other treats, previously eaten. The upside is that ordering cat treats is now easy, Friskies it is all the way. Five stars for the cats preferences.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: These treats make my cat go crazy
customer_reviews.text: I am awakened at night because of my cat begging for some Purina Friskies Party Mix Original Crunch Cat Treats. Whenever I walk by her she sits down and meows rapidly and will not be satisfied until I give her a treat. After she finishes the treat she just wants more! If I even touch or move the jar of treats she'll come running and beg for treats. Not sure what they put in these treats but they have made my cat very obsessed with getting a treat all the time.
customer_reviews.author: K. Padgett

customer_reviews.title: Fuzzy loves Purina Friskies Partu Mix Lip Lickin Chicken Cat Treat
customer_reviews.text: Fuzzy and Porsche, our beautiful elderly felines absolutely love these treats. When they hear us shake the container of Lip Lickin Chicken Cat Treats they come running. I order 2 of these 20 ounce chicken flavor treats every month for Fuzzy and her sister. They always arrive within 48 hours, and come in a sealed reusable storage container. The container keeps the treats fresh and dry, so they are tasty to the last treat.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: There must be "kittycrack" in these!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these for a couple of weeks, but my kitty is addicted ... when I shake the container, she comes running damned near out of control like she was shot out of a cannon during the middle of a nap, like she arrives in the kitchen thinking "Now WHAT am I doing here?" but then quickly remembers and starts rubbing up against my calves ...In order to get "human points" for providing these awesome treats, I give her about 4 or 5 per night and give them to her one at a time from the palm of my hand ...
customer_reviews.author: Mark Zemke

customer_reviews.title: CAT NIPPED, Some one got hungry.
customer_reviews.text: First thing i noticed was there was not enough treats in the container , then of course there was no seal stuck to the rim like the other 30 or so previous treats i had purchased before. As you can see from the picture, the container wasn't as full as it should be. I BUY A LOT OF THESE AND THIS IS A FIRST. Never had a problem before. BY THE WAY THE ORDER WAS REFUNDED IN FIVE MINUTES AND I HAD IT REPLACED WITHIN 24 HOURS
customer_reviews.author: Hyspeed

customer_reviews.title: Your cat will love you!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my God! My cat will not leave me alone anymore! These things are super dooper treats to her! She will do anything to get her mouth on these. Even letting me clip her nail, give her baths and a whole list of other things she used to fear. i am so happy we gave these a try. Talked to her vet as well and she tells me they are just mostly protein so they are fine in moderation. So buyer beware. You might have a super happy cat on your hands if you buy these! Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia MTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: If you have been in the habit of using Temptation treats think twice before using these. Your cats will love them, they'll start turning up their noses at the Temptations and you will end up saving money. Who wants to find a product that your cats prefer and is CHEAPER? LMAO OK, so maybe you should try these. Seriously, my old Grand Dame that has never taken a Temptation treat loves, loves, loves these. The others give me dirty looks but what am I to do, I still have several bags I need to get rid of.
customer_reviews.author: Martha E. Beck

customer_reviews.title: Do not order in the summer if you live in hot zones
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived almost melted. It must have remained in the delivery truck for an undue amount of time. I didn't think it would be unhealthful to feed the treats to my cats; but no, they ate them and were throwing up all day. I live the the Inland Valley in Southern California and the week these were delivered was one of the hottest we had seen. So even though Amazon has the best price for these cat treats, and all pet food for that matter ( I order food for my cats and dog through Amazon), I have cancelled my monthly subscription of all pet food until the temperatures drop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't agree with kitty's digestive system
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to do a review for this product. My cats loved them so they would give five stars if they could. They liked them so much they would beg for them constantly. The reason I can't give them 5 stars is, they gave the cats gas and smelly feces that would drive you out of the house. I was concerned what is in it that made both cats have digestive issues. My cats are sad they don't get treats anymore, but they must feel so much better without all the smelly gas. I know I do
customer_reviews.author: WMTT

customer_reviews.title: Bailey likes...and she is picky and about 15 yrs.
customer_reviews.text: Friskies party mix is just fine, per Baily. Have been trying different treats lately. She won't eat soft treats, or hard ones w/soft inside. So pretty much this and greenies. I have tried some freeze dried tuna, which is also "acceptable". But not the freeze dried salmon...go figure. BTW, For those with older cats....I'm also feeding her regular canned chicken, vs canned cat food (which she seemed to throw up a lot). The canned chicken is perfect (and one large Costco can is 4 meals). I switch some with canned tuna...but she cleans out the chicken bowl faster!
customer_reviews.author: R BTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: This is a great treat but the best by date is only a couple months out.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this treat, it is the only one he will eat. The ingredients use chicken and chicken meal, rather than a full chicken meal and it is less fatty some alternatives. The value for the price is great, however I have an issue with the best by date. I purchased this treat in April and it says it is best by August 2020. Usually best by dates are pushed a little further (over a year) allowing me to keep the tub sealed longer.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Beware: cats may become addicted!
customer_reviews.text: Both of my cats are addicted to these treats and Temptations. In fact, I am beginning to think my older cat, Zoe, needs to attend C.T.A. (cat treats anonymous). She begs for treats all the time! But I am happy to see and hear both cats happily munching away when they find the treats that I hide around the apartment. I've tested the cats to see if they prefer Friskies treats over Temptations using side by side tests of the treats together. They have consistently shown an equal interest in both brands and types of treats. So, I typically buy Friskies because it's more economical and will only buy Temptations if I have a little extra to spend.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby W.

customer_reviews.title: My cats can't get enough of these treats!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about these cat treats? I have two cats that love them and can't get enough of them. They love them and prefer them over that other well-known brand that has cats leaping all the way up to a second floor balcony to get them, well, at least they do in the TV commercials for them. Purina has always been a brand that I have trusted and I have yet to meet a cat that didn't go crazy for it.
customer_reviews.author: JWalch

customer_reviews.title: Like just as much as Temptations and better ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: Temptations were out of stock. My cats are so addicted to the chicken flavored Temptations that I would buy them in the canister size. Knowing that they would find this situation unacceptable, I tried these Friskies treats. An I don’t like these is infinitely better than I ain’t got none! They liked them just as much as the Temptations. I looked at the ingredients and these Friskies treats seem to have a much better profile. I’ll see how they do on them longer term, but so far they are winners!
customer_reviews.author: NutellaBear

customer_reviews.title: Fresh, our cats seem to find them tasty. Good price.
customer_reviews.text: My three indoor cats go crazy over these treats. Two male and one female cat. They definitely enjoy them more than other treats that we have tried. They are always fresh, crispy and full size not broken. The bottom of the container is not filled with dust from the treats like some brands. I think it's a good price for the quality and our cats seem very happy with the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: BigJim

customer_reviews.title: Party Mix
customer_reviews.text: We have a Bengal named Angel , He will not eat his breakfast until you give him a treat first. He will follow you around till you give him the Friskies Party mix . He is one of the smartest cats we have , I put it in a small treat toy . He is the only one who can figure out how to get them out.My husband has brought other treats and the cats will not touch them they only eat the Party Mix .
customer_reviews.author: danny devito

customer_reviews.title: Cats Love these treats.
customer_reviews.text: I was having a problem with my 10 yr old tabby losing weight because he was so picky (He was Healthy) I tried several other dried foods but after 3-4 days he would stop eating them so I tried some treats but had the same problem until I bought Friskies Treats I rotate 3 different flavors throughout the day with 3 regularly scheduled meals of FF wet cat food 1.5oz daily and he started to gain weight again but it's a nightmare keeping up with his schedule, But he's worth it..
customer_reviews.author: Tony Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: Nibbles Loves the Party Mix!
customer_reviews.text: My cat, Nibbles, cannot get enough of the Friskies Party Mix. I don't know what they put in the mix to make it so irresistible, but it works. I've been feeding her the party mix for several years, and she never gets tired of it. I give it to her as a treat and sometimes as an appetizer for her normal kitty kibble. Nibbles thanks you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Bee

customer_reviews.title: My cats really like these treats but I have to feed them one at a time slowly to prevent puking
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these treats but I have to be careful to limit their intake because I don't want the cats to get fat. Too many treats at once can also make the cat puke. It's a good idea to give the treats one at a time 15-30 seconds apart to allow the cat to chew them up. If I dump 3 or 4 treats in front of my cats at once, they just inhale them whole without chewing and that's when I've had problems with puking. How do i know this? It's easy to see when the puke is fur free and filled with unchewed, whole cat treats.
customer_reviews.author: RolidnotTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: It's decent for the value
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the packaging, the lid to the container is somewhat rough when twisting and doesn't secure properly so if you squeeze the Jug you can hear air escaping.. legit these cat treats remind me of old school cheap cat food, very hard but the cat seems to like them anyways.. good value for the price when on sale
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mikey O

customer_reviews.title: Not Protected
customer_reviews.text: The inner protective foil had been removed from under the plastic lid before I opened the plastic bottle. I have no idea if something might have been added to the contents or not that could harm my animals. There were small pieces of the covering left on the rim of the plastic bottle which made it obvious that it had not been left off during filling by error or accident.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These Cat Treats Are The Best I've Found
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these treats. Like cats do, he had to smell and inspect them thoroughly before he would try one. One is all he needed. He now knows when I'm getting them down for him and he runs to me and gobbles up every one that I put out. They have a very pleasing texture and smell and although I'll switch them out from time to time I know that I'll be buying these for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: David Essary

customer_reviews.title: I made a mistake
customer_reviews.text: I give my cats temptation treats and ordered this by mistake. Kitty cats won't eat them so I dumped them in their dry food. What a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: MaggieMurphy

customer_reviews.title: Friskies Party Mix Treats-Holiday every day for kitty cats.
customer_reviews.text: Friskies Party Mix is a favorite with my kitties and also gave to friends who have cats for their kitty Christmas. I have one kitty who can only eat the smaller treats like these because of his bite and teeth. Glad I found something he can enjoy too at treat time. Great product and large container is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Villagemom

customer_reviews.title: Cat Treats
customer_reviews.text: Cats I can afford for my asylum of 9 cats. They love their treats and I love that I can afford to give them their treats. This is a very good product and the shipping is awesome....so glad the company isn't greedy and keeps the treats at a price us poor folks can afford. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Only treats he will eat!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only treats my cat will eat! Not joking for 4 years he refused to eat treats and on a fluke I tried the tiny pack of these you can buy in store for like $2. He's hooked! Great value, this size container lasts us a few months(as long as dad doesnt over treat him) He loves these so much you can shake the container and he comes running.
customer_reviews.author: James Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: Cats LOVE them,. But that's also a BAD thing. Literally addicted to them
customer_reviews.text: I can rate 5 stars or Zero. The cats love it. For 5 stars. On the other hand rate it zero because there's some kind of cat heroin or something in these that makes the cats addicted. Not in a good way. My old man cat CONSTANTLY hounds me for more and more. Follows me around the house and meows until I give him some. And the time space between treats is growing smaller and smaller before he badgers me again. Think twice introducing your cat to these... I warned you...
customer_reviews.author: alascar

customer_reviews.title: We all, love the treats, and I love the ease of Amazon, order on line, if cats, lean this, and to open lids, I am out, I am sure
customer_reviews.text: My 3 furry, step kids, sure like these different Party Mix treats. After a day of rest, for them or an evening/night of keeping my house, porch, and yard, small rodant free, they love coming in their cat door, right to my lap. I would not fit into this mix, however, if they could open the lids! I have tried all 3-4 flavours, can't really they like one better then the other, all great to them.
customer_reviews.author: Philip O.

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves these. but they are not a good value.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these. but they are not a good value. per ounce price is usually cheaper at most stores.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Shortz

customer_reviews.title: NO PAKING MATERIAL
customer_reviews.text: Item cracked because NO PAVCkING MATERIAL ADDED TO THE HUGE BOX HEAVY ITEMS SMASJED AROUND ON TOP OF OTHER ITEM, SUPPOSED TO BE A NOTE ON MY ACVOUNT ABOUT THIS WE SEE THST WORKED WELL..... NOT!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: It's not crunchy
customer_reviews.text: The product was soft and fell apart when I placed it in the bowl. My cat was not happy either.
customer_reviews.author: Junellen

customer_reviews.title: Shake the container and they’ll come running.
customer_reviews.text: My cats have loved Temptations treats for years. Tried this party mix because it’s less expensive. They like it even better. With picky cats that’s a win, win for me. If I want them to stay outside when I’m vacuuming, I just shake the container and they rush out to the back patio. Works every time.
customer_reviews.author: butitsadryheat

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Cat Treat
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these...I just give them a few at a time and they purr and chew them up so fast. I've tried other flavors and they aren't them same. I even tried a different brand and they wouldn't touch the treats. Cats know what they like!
customer_reviews.author: Old Doc

customer_reviews.title: I call these "kitty crack"
customer_reviews.text: My cat can't get enough of these. Be careful they don't stop eating regular food once they get used to these things. I used to tell the cat sitter not to give her too many, and she'd give her piles. It was hard to cut her off of them and get her to eat normal food. Sorry, Purina -- guess that's a good/bad review!
customer_reviews.author: Joanie

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them
customer_reviews.text: I have two adult cats that loves these. I Like that they come in 20 and 30oz bottles. Will keep buying more. It's much cheaper than another brand I used to buy and they love it the same, I just have to shake the bottle and they come running.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Truth in advertising, Fur Kids agree - !Party Mix!
customer_reviews.text: Truth in advertising, Fur Kids agree - !Party Mix! I use them for claw clipping, brushing time, medicine time if needed, and "Trick Time". Everyone, 2 Maine Coons, one little house kitty, and the 70 pound dog line up to do shake, hi-5, and roll over for treats. Great incentive. (Dog has his own cheesy party mix)
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Maybe be great but we don't know lol
customer_reviews.text: My picky ass cat hated it, no matter how we attempted to dress it up. She wanted no parts
customer_reviews.author: Tracey-Ann Spearman

customer_reviews.title: Cat treats
customer_reviews.text: Was worried the cats wouldn't like it, but they loved it. Even more than Temptations.
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: Kitty and I got hooked on the old chicken Party Mix (with the yellow cap)
customer_reviews.text: which we together agreed was a "5" except for the price, which doesn't stop us. This does not come near it for taste, and wouldn't buy it again. You can't find it here anymore, so we shop at the other pet place.
customer_reviews.author: WhosKiddingWhom

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: I know it's not the healthiest product but my cat loves it. No frills but does the job really well. It's a big canister. I don't recall seeing this size in the supermarket so lasts above a month for my two cats.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Roberto Magana

customer_reviews.title: Our Cats Love These Treats
customer_reviews.text: Our cats go crazy over the Party Mix treats. My boy was refusing to eat his food, just stood at the pantry door begging me to give in to treat time. Changed the behavior for the most part, but occasionally if mom says no, he'll go to dad when I'm not looking. We compared notes and figured out just how smart cats really are. Needless to say, they're cat approved.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: The Princess approves!
customer_reviews.text: This is Cassidy's favorite. She's our little (feline) Princess, and apparently this is what Princesses like to snack on at treat time. They come in all sorts of interesting shapes, and while you might wonder why that might matter, it does to her. She doesn't like the square Temptations treats, even if they are the same flavor. She likes these. No, she LOVES these. We have 9 other kitties who like these too. But the Princess has spoken and given her crunch of approval.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bayne

customer_reviews.title: Your cat will go nuts for these!
customer_reviews.text: Buy at your own risk cause your cat will not leave you alone if she knows you have these in the house! 😉 My cat goes nuts for these things! I buy this and the seafood flavor. Much cheaper buying in this large container here on Amazon. Very happy with my purchase! 😃😃
customer_reviews.author: Alicia MTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves original flavor best.
customer_reviews.text: My cat refuses all “human food” and won’t eat canned cat food. Weird huh.. She goes to her bed and waits for this treat, even though that’s likely to get her put to bed for the night. She loves it! Original flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Chaska

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cats
customer_reviews.text: I love that it arrives quickly, it must taste great because my cats beg for it, it also smells good. I like that it comes in the large container and it's a great value for the money. I will continue to buys this and the other flavors as my cats like them all
customer_reviews.author: TediBare

customer_reviews.title: Try these treats! My cats love them too!
customer_reviews.text: This is good stuff! My cats love this treat! After observing how my hungry cats devoured these, I couldn’t resist trying them. They’re a little dry (think milk), but have a crunchy texture and an organic, green flavor without leaving an after-taste. I had a bonding, close feeling with my cats, and their eyes watered-up as they watched me share their treats. I can’t wait to try them on my favorite organic, free-range, locally grown kale salad.
customer_reviews.author: DBD

customer_reviews.title: My Tabby Kitten Loves These Treats!
customer_reviews.text: I shake the canister every morning and Miss Mittens... comes to get a few treats to eat... She is very particular and has not loved the other brands... but this one.. she does! Crunchy and tasty !
customer_reviews.author: Historical Maiden

customer_reviews.title: Best treat investment
customer_reviews.text: This was a great treat investment. Large container of well priced treats that both cats and the dog have figured out the location of and will beg for. Container seems to have kept treats safe (from the cats, who can reach it), dry, and fresh enough for months. Also works for grooming bribery for the fluffiest cat. Glad I got this.
customer_reviews.author: Dewey

customer_reviews.title: Both cats LOVE this treat!
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to have a good hard treat, as soft treats may be bad for teeth. Both cats (my sister's older cats) love this treat, and act as though they just devoured a fresh can of (human) tuna fish.
customer_reviews.author: hiwatt

customer_reviews.title: Mostly broken pieces
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy the small packets in the grocery store, but thought I'd try these. I bought two containers and they are both 80% broken in half or crumbs.
customer_reviews.author: PNWrez

customer_reviews.title: Best cat treats ever, say our cats!
customer_reviews.text: Is there any other cat treats? Well, not in our house! Only Purina Friskies Party Mix, especially the new gravy or cheese flavored ones! Trust a family with 8 very spoiled indoor rescued cats, these treats are the cat s meow!
customer_reviews.author: L. Holleman

customer_reviews.title: That there affordable!!!! And it’s a DOORDASHER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My two cute 🐈 are FUNNY, they love FRISKIES!!! One day and FANCYFEAST!!!! Another,/RachealRAY, the point is they LOVE it ALL LOL there 🆒🆒CATS!!!!😽😽. Great for 💰. Come on cats let’s get eating, or they will eat it right up, 😸, DOORBUSTER!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MaryJane Hoad

customer_reviews.title: Zara the cat approves heartily
customer_reviews.text: Our cat Zara would live off these treats if we let her. So her review is ‘Mrawwwwww’ - which I’m guessing means ‘well, the humans did something useful today’ - referring to us of course - who rarely seem to live up to her expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Alison M.

customer_reviews.title: Not so popular with the cat
customer_reviews.text: Good value as far as cat treats go but cat does not like flavor/texture as much as the Temptations brand of treats. He eats them but not with the same enthusiasm as other treats I have offered.
customer_reviews.author: TimberlineCruiser

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves these treats
customer_reviews.text: Originally, this was supposed to be just a "treat" food for my cat. But he loves it so much, I give it to him on a regular basis (along with occasional regular dry food). He supplements his food with an occasional mouse or dove, which he will catch outside. Don't worry, these's no lack of doves here in the Deep South.
customer_reviews.author: david ready

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these treats and I can’t find them in my grocery store anymore, so I get them here. The price is good compared to what it used to be at the grocery store. Fast shipping, which is awesome, since I cannot run out. I have one cat who will not eat any other brand treats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A big hit with the cats
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what these taste like, but the cats beg for them, so they must be good. And the small chunks are easy to dish our without getting your hands (very) dirty. I always have some on hand, along with the other flavors so I can dish out a few every day to everybody.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Original treats are the best.
customer_reviews.text: Of all the Friskies treats we’ve bought, this original treat is our cat’s favorite. Has bigger size treats that our cat loves to crunch. Other versions are smaller in size and are usually broken up into a lot of crumbs which our cat would not eat.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My cats get treats all the time so this big container was a great value. Both of my cats liked the flavor which is shocking because one of my vats is very picky with her treats. Will be buying again !
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat would eat these exclusively if given the choice. We give him a few pieces now and then as treat or as an "appetizer" if he's being finicky about eating his canned food.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't smell too good, but it must taste great.
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these treats. They really don't smell all that good to me, but the cats just love them. When I open the cannister, they come a running. I've tried other brands, but my cats like this one the best.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My very picky cat loves the Friskies treats. I love the plastic bottles that they come in when I order the 20 oz treats on Amazon. Makes for very easy storage and they stay fresh! Fantastic buy for a picky eater (my cat, not me!).
customer_reviews.author: Lauren R.

customer_reviews.title: Personally, I can't give much comment other than that ...
customer_reviews.text: Personally, I can't give much comment other than that they smell awful. My cat, on the other hand, is a crazed fan! She clearly prefers these over the Temptations she'd been getting previously. She will actually attack the canister for more.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Purfect treat for picky eatter!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Siamese cat who is very picky in her daily treats. This is just what I needed - a huge container to keep her happy and healthy. Happy Cat =^..^=
customer_reviews.author: Joan Altemus

customer_reviews.title: My Fur Babies just loves these treats.
customer_reviews.text: My little Fur Kids usually eats Temptations Backyard Cookout, and I wanted to try these. Wonderful products and my Furry Adopted Son and Daughter loves this treats and everyone is happy.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES R. ROGERS

customer_reviews.title: The cat absolutly loved them.!!!
customer_reviews.text: From day one the cat just couldn't get enough of these treats. She's normally a little standoff-ish and a very picky eater but now she comes looking for attention and treats. If I want her to finish the food in her bowl all I have to do is put a few treats on top.
customer_reviews.author: Boomer47

customer_reviews.title: Friskies Party Mix Adult Cat Treats Canister Chicken
customer_reviews.text: My cats absolutely love these! One of the best things about them is that they come in a plastic container that I can just shake and it's summons all of my cats at once!
customer_reviews.author: Angie N.

customer_reviews.title: All my cats love the various flavors
customer_reviews.text: Nice large economy size for my 5 cats!! Two went crazy for them, the other cats preferred the other flavors. Elvis gets up each morning be dancing his Frisky treats😁
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Good snack
customer_reviews.text: My Siamese/Bengal mix loves these; I give them to him when I get home from work, because there is still a few hours before dinner. But, my sphynx won’t touch them. Came as expected and easy to grab a few and reseal with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Diya

customer_reviews.title: 👍 Great product that both of my picky cats love!
customer_reviews.text: My two cats will ONLY eat these treats. I buy them constantly. They stay fresh in the plastic ja so, that’s nice! The Christmas ones are even shaped like 🎄 Christmas trees which I thought was super cute!
customer_reviews.author: GamerMom

customer_reviews.title: Cat Party Mix
customer_reviews.text: My cat's favorite snack and I like that it comes in a larger size so I don't have to buy it as often. The cat's happy....I'm happy, what more can I ask?
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Mazzeo

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: My two cats seem to love it. They come running as soon as they hear it or smell it come out of the closet. The portion I give them is gone in 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Fried

customer_reviews.title: CATS LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: My cats went nuts for these! I barely got the lid off and the cats acted like they have never been fed in the their lives. They went insane for these.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Kleine

customer_reviews.title: Broken pieces and No Protective Cover
customer_reviews.text: These by far are the worst treats to purchase. The snacks I received came in a plastic box that was not sealed and come in bits and pieces. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: My cats eat WAY more of these than they recommend but what can I say
customer_reviews.text: My cats eat WAY more of these than they recommend but what can I say? I think they have some kind of cat "crack" in them because last night my kitten knocked the treat can off the counter to get some. Buying them in this quantity is economical and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: lulu4magik

customer_reviews.title: Kitties give this two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: My kitty loves these. I have these on auto-delivery and get them every month. I try to get a different flavor each month so she won't get bored. They are quality products and seem to be like a favorite for all kitties especially mine. Great variety of flavors too This price cannot be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny D Aunt/ It's ShellTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Ok product.
customer_reviews.text: The treats feel moist in the container. Im not sure if that is the way they are suppose to feel or not. I was expecting them to feel like other dry cat treats. My cats seem to like them but i probably wouldn't purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R.

customer_reviews.title: Cat pleaser
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 new, semi-wild cats. I give them a few treats and pet them as they nibble. It's also a great way to get them to come to you by shaking the container. Is it good for them versus feeding only a healthy cat food? Not really, but at this early stage it's a big help in building trust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cats like these treats
customer_reviews.text: Both my cats enjoy these treats, so the flavor, and thickness must be to their liking. For me it is a good value for my money, because they eat these.
customer_reviews.author: DerylH

customer_reviews.title: Our cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: We use them as treats (4-6 at a time) when they come in voluntarily in the evenings. They used to sometimes stay out all night otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: B. K. Wallen

customer_reviews.title: Cats love these treats
customer_reviews.text: All the cats love them. They wish they could eat them instead of their cat food but that would be too expensive plus they would get super fat and possibly unhealthy.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona

customer_reviews.title: Great value.  My cat's favorite treats.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say.... my order history says I have "ordered this item 17 times". My cat likes them... and my cat is very picky. Great value for the $$$
customer_reviews.author: AdamHD

customer_reviews.title: My Cats Love Them
customer_reviews.text: Made with real chicken, which my cats love. I shake the bottle every morning after they enjoy their breakfast and they all get into their spot to enjoy these treats. It's our morning ritual.
customer_reviews.author: Cool NY Gal

customer_reviews.title: didnt survive shipping
customer_reviews.text: when these were opened they were more bits and pieces of the treats. very few of the whole treats and my boys had difficulty with them.
customer_reviews.author: DEBRA HAMMOND

customer_reviews.title: Kitty treats
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves kitty treats but why are they so costly????? I have also found she will eat the heck out of the dog treats which are a fraction of the cost so, guess what? When these are gone..... it's dog treats for my kitty!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Bean

customer_reviews.title: my cats love it
customer_reviews.text: I leave them treats in a puzzle every day and they cry if I leave the house without putting this out. The larger size is more economical.
customer_reviews.author: cMorse

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Crack- as we call it, drives our 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Kitty Crack- as we call it, drives our 4 wild when they hear the package open- although my cats are the only cats in the world not into fish they will eat this- have tried other treats and they kinda look smugly at them take a nibble and walk away- not these- they lick the linoleum of every crumb.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon E Moore

customer_reviews.title: Do not give
customer_reviews.text: Our two Burmese cats love this stuff. I have not tasted it myself but gave it five stars for flavor based upon the speed at which the cats approach their bowls and inhale the crunchies when served. We get the chicken and liver flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Randyf

customer_reviews.title: Came in all crumbs but my cat still love them!
customer_reviews.text: Came in all crumbs but my cat still love them! Those are all the crumbs still on the bottom and that’s not even half of the crumbs that were in it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Cat loved this!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very picky eater, and my cat loves this treat. I was surprised, since she hasn't liked other flavors if this same treat.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Best value for your money! Cats love the most!
customer_reviews.text: Best treat out there! Tried all other brands but cats love to party!! Price is great and better than more costly brands my cats won’t eat.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Is too honest!

customer_reviews.title: Cat's love it and it's actually nutritious
customer_reviews.text: All the cats like this product and ask for it specifically. Yeah sounds crazy but they'll bitch until they get this exact treat.
customer_reviews.author: OldTooly

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: False advertising! First two ingredients say chicken and chicken meal but what I got is chicken by - product meal and brewers rice!
customer_reviews.author: Markus Aurelius Maximus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cat Treat at a Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what's in this, but two of our four cats go nuts for it, to the point I've named it "kitty crack". Put some in one of those rolly treat dispenser thingies and those two are entertained for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Morelock

customer_reviews.title: Great value for my cat favorite snack
customer_reviews.text: My cat is obsessed with this snack. Keeps asking for it 5 times a day. The value of this package compared to the price paid for smaller packages in Publix is amazing
customer_reviews.author: djairo

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Read the ingredients. I can't believe I was feeding this to my kittens.
customer_reviews.author: Adam ADub

customer_reviews.title: Crack for cats
customer_reviews.text: It's crack for cats. I shake the jar and our little critters will shoot straight up in the air from a dead sleep. It's the easiest way to buy a cat's affection that I've found. All humor aside, we have two very old cats that were not eating most of the time. This stuff, however, they will scarf down. We credit it with prolonging their life, and they purr like kittens when we give it to them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B.

customer_reviews.title: My cat says California Dreamin' tastes better!
customer_reviews.text: This one's okay, but my cat likes California Dreamin' better, but Purina just doesn't package it in this size. I like this size because it lasts longer than those smaller bags. Wrote to Purina about this a while back but never got a response.
customer_reviews.author: PepIvy

product_meta.title: Friskies Party Mix Adult Cat Treats Canisters – Real Chicken #1 Ingredient
product_meta.description: Color:Original - Chicken, Liver, Turkey| Size:20 oz. CanisterServe up a sensational snack for your cat with Purina Friskies Party Mix Original Crunch adult cat treats. Each delightful treat features real chicken as the #1 ingredient, so you know your cat's getting wholesome goodness in addition to an irresistible taste. Liver and turkey deliver purr-fectly delicious flavors to her snacking experience, while the intriguing shapes invite her to paw and play at treat time. She's sure to love the satisfying crunch found in these cat treats, and you can love giving her a between-meal reward that also helps clean her teeth. Feed her a few treats during playtime to make every moment you spend with her even more enjoyable, or leave a treat in her dish as a special surprise between meals. This Purina Friskies Party Mix recipe offers a mouthwatering combination of savory flavors cats adore, making every bite a true treat for her taste buds. Getting the tasty treats your cat craves just takes a few clicks when you order Purina Friskies on Amazon.com.
feature_bullets: One (1) 20 oz. Canister - Purina Friskies Made in USA Facilities Cat Treats, Party Mix Original Crunch
One (1) 20-Ounce Canister of Purina Friskies Party Mix Favorites Original Crunch Flavor Cat Treats
